text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Example Reject Code System

This code system contains example NCPDP Reject Codes (511-FB codes set) to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering a data or business rule error that prevents processing from completing. This is a placeholder to be replaced prior to publishing with a formal mechanism for referencing in FHIR.

This code system http://ncpdp.org/reject-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
N1 No Patient Match FoundNo Patient Match Found
21 M/I Product/Service IDMissing or Invalid Product/Service ID
598 More Than One Patient FoundMore Than One Patient Found
599 Cardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did NotCardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did Not
600 Coverage Outside Submitted Date Of TransactionCoverage Outside Submitted Date Of Transaction
